page.title: 17HOME LIFE
page.content: Home life to us means a secure,safe, warm place to live.We asked young people what the word home means to them.The most popular answer was a bed to sleep on.Other answers included playing on bikes and going home from school. The main foods that we like to eat are chips,fish,pizzas and ice-cream.Not many of us eat salad,cornflakes or bacon and eggs. We asked our classes what pet they like best. Most people chose dogs,gerbils and cats.Not many people chose hamsters and spiders. At home the thing that we like best is watching television.We also enjoy playing games,collecting rubbers,postcards and stamps.Some of us enjoy flower pressing.
